original_title: Biffy Clyro - Isle Of Wight Festival
overview: The 2019 Isle Of Wight Festival ended when Biffy Clyro closed the Main Stage in spectacular fashion, with pyrotechnics and fireworks aplenty. The truly anthemic set spanned their 20+ year career and their return to the Isle of Wight Festival was welcomed by the band and fans alike; frontman Simon Neil, clad in a mustard suit proclaimed “we love this festival, it’s great to be back”.
title: Biffy Clyro - Isle Of Wight Festival
